T02D1689:35a-1: de b'i t'a re ae ka bingsha ti sto tra bi shuddhe tsunda ma ni n'a ma /
T02D1689:35a-3: lha mo sgrol ma nyi shu rtsa gcig la bstod pa /
T02D1689:35a-4: rnam dag gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba /
T02D1689:35a-5: mgon po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags
T02D1689:35a-6: pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo
T02D1689:35a-7: // phyag 'tshal rab tu dpa' ba'i sgrol ma //
T02D1689:35a-8: spros med rnam dag nam mkha'i dkyil na //
T02D1689:35a-9: padma gser mdog gdan la bzhugs pa'i //
T02D1689:35a-10: sku mdog dmar mo me yi 'od can //
T02D1689:35a-11: phyag 'tshal zhal gcig phyag brgyad spyan rgyas //
T02D1689:35a-12: dga' ba'i phyag rgya dang po gnyis ni //
T02D1689:35a-13: rdo rje dril bu spyi bor bsnol nas //
T02D1689:35a-14: g-yas 'og mda' gzhu thugs kar 'dzin ma //
T02D1689:35a-15: phyag 'tshal gsum pas 'khor lo bsnams te //
T02D1689:35a-16: bzhi pa shes rab ral gri 'debs tshul //
T02D1689:35a-17: g-yon gyi gsum pas thugs kar dung 'dzin //
T02D1689:35a-18: bzhi pa na ni zhags pas brgyan ma //
T02D1689:35a-19: phyag 'tshal dkar mo zla mdangs sgrol ma //
T02D1689:35a-20: sku gsum rdzogs pa'i zhal gsum g-yas sngo //
T02D1689:35a-21: g-yon zhal 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser mdog / rten 'brel dag pa'i phyag ni bcu gnyis //
T02D1689:35a-22: phyag 'tshal dang po mnyam pa'i phyag rgya //
T02D1689:35a-23: gnyis pa na ni kha tavm' ga bsnams //
T02D1689:35a-25: bzhi pa yid bzhi nor bu bsnams ma //
T02D1689:35a-26: phyag 'tshal lang pa rdo rje rab 'chad //
T02D1689:35a-27: drug pa na ni me tog phreng 'dzin //
T02D1689:35a-28: g-yon gyi gnyis pa ril ba spyi blugs //
T02D1689:35a-29: nyon mongs dri ma ma lus 'khrud ma //
T02D1689:35a-31: stong pa'i sgra sgrogs bzhi pa dril bu //
T02D1689:35a-32: lnga pa gter gyi bum pa thogs ma //
T02D1689:35a-33: drug pa po tis 'gro la chos ston //
T02D1689:35a-34: phyag 'tshal gser mdog can gyi sgrol ma //
T02D1689:35a-35: sna tshogs padma zla ba'i gdan la //
T02D1689:35a-36: rdo rje skyil krung shin tu mdzes brjid //
T02D1689:35a-37: phyag bcu pha rol phyin bcu dag ma //
T02D1689:35a-38: phyag 'tshal dang po thugs kar phreng 'dzin //
T02D1689:35a-39: gnyis pa na ni shes rab ral gri //
T02D1689:35a-40: gsum pa mda' 'phen nyon mongs 'bigs ma //
T02D1689:35a-41: bzhi pa rdo rje lnga pa dbyu gu //
T02D1689:35b-0: phyag 'tshal @35b g-yon gyis dar dbyangs rab bsnams //
T02D1689:35b-1: gnyis pa zhags pa gsum pa padma //
T02D1689:35b-2: bzhi pa'i phyag gis dril bu dkrol ma //
T02D1689:35b-3: lnga pa na ni snying rje'i gzhu thogs //
T02D1689:35b-4: phyag 'tshal gtsug tor rgyal ba'i sgrol ma //
T02D1689:35b-5: chu skyes padma ser po'i steng du //
T02D1689:35b-6: zag med bde rgyas zla ba'i gdan steng ;
T02D1689:35b-7: / sems dpa'i skyil krung brtan bar bzhugs ma //
T02D1689:35b-8: phyag 'tshal dge ma gser gyi mdog can //
T02D1689:35b-9: thugs rje'i rang bzhin 'gro la rab brtse //
T02D1689:35b-10: zhal gcig phyag bzhi bdud bzhi 'joms ma //
T02D1689:35b-11: g-yas kyi dang pos dngos grub mchog stsol //
T02D1689:35b-12: phyag 'tshal rgyun mi 'chad pa'i bsam gtan //
T02D1689:35b-13: gnyis pa na ni phreng ba 'dzin ma //
T02D1689:35b-14: g-yon gyi dang po phyag mtshan gundhe //
T02D1689:35b-15: gnyis pa rin chen dbyu gu bsnams ma //
T02D1689:35b-16: phyag 'tshal h'um sgra sgrogs pa'i sgrol ma //
T02D1689:35b-17: dri med zla ba'i gdan gyi steng na //
T02D1689:35b-18: nyon mongs skyon bral dag pa'i sku mdog / bcom g-ya' bral gser gyi mdangs ldan //
T02D1689:35b-19: phyag 'tshal dpa' mo shes rab bdag nyid //
T02D1689:35b-20: thugs rjes 'khor ba zhe la mnan nas //
T02D1689:35b-21: ma rungs 'dul phyir h'um gi sgra sgrogs //
T02D1689:35b-22: dug gsum srid pa'i g-yul las rgyal ma //
T02D1689:35b-23: phyag 'tshal bden gnyis dag pa'i phyag rgya //
T02D1689:35b-24: 'gro rnams thugs rjes rab tu bzung phyir //
T02D1689:35b-25: g-yas pa'i phyag gis mchog sbyin mdzad cing //
T02D1689:35b-26: g-yon pas padma ser po 'dzin ma //
T02D1689:35b-27: phyag 'tshal rnam par rgyal ba'i sgrol ma //
T02D1689:35b-28: chu skyes padma dmar po'i steng du //
T02D1689:35b-29: gti mug dag phyir nyi ma'i gdan steng //
T02D1689:35b-30: sems dpa'i skyil krung 'gro la gzigs ma //
T02D1689:35b-31: phyag 'tshal lha dang drang srong rnams kyis //
T02D1689:35b-32: khyod zhabs padmo spyi bor blangs nas //
T02D1689:35b-33: thugs rje che mnga' khyod la rab bstod //
T02D1689:35b-34: 'gro ba kun gyi re gnas gyur ma //
T02D1689:35b-35: phyag 'tshal padma r'a ga'i mdangs ldan //
T02D1689:35b-36: phyag bzhi g-yas kyi dang po nyid na //
T02D1689:35b-37: rdo rje 'phyar zhing de 'og ral gri //
T02D1689:35b-38: g-yon gyis sdigs mdzub zhags pa bsnams ma //
T02D1689:35b-39: phyag 'tshal rgol ba 'joms pa'i sgrol ma //
T02D1689:35b-40: padma ser dang nyi ma'i gdan la //
T02D1689:35b-41: dpa' ba'i stang stabs 'gying bag g-yon brkyang //
T02D1689:35b-42: tsham rngam nag mo khros pa'i bzhin 'phyar //
T02D1689:36a-1: 'tshal na bza' gser mdog gos gyon //
T02D1689:36a-2: dbu skra gyen brdzes ltos 'gros brgyan ma //
T02D1689:36a-3: rin chen cod pan mkha' la rab 'phyar //
T02D1689:36a-4: phyag zhabs rin chen gdu bus brgyan ma //
T02D1689:36a-5: phyag 'tshal phyag bzhi g-yas kyi dang po //
T02D1689:36a-6: 'khor lo 'dzin cing gnyis pa ral gri //
T02D1689:36a-7: skye gnas steng du zhags pa bsnams nas //
T02D1689:36a-8: g-yon gyi thams sdigs mdzub rab gdengs //
T02D1689:36a-9: phyag 'tshal dbang mchog ster ba'i sgrol ma //
T02D1689:36a-10: nyi ma padma dkar po'i steng du //
T02D1689:36a-11: gdug pa 'dul phyir chu srin gdan steng //
T02D1689:36a-12: skyil krung phyed ma gser gyi mdog can //
T02D1689:36a-13: phyag 'tshal khros pa'i gnyer ma dang ldan //
T02D1689:36a-14: brjid pa'i sku mdog zhal gcig phyag bzhi //
T02D1689:36a-15: g-yas na mya ngan med pa'i yal ga / gnyis pa rin chen bsnams shing mchog stsol //
T02D1689:36a-16: phyag 'tshal g-yon gyi dang po padma //
T02D1689:36a-17: nyon mongs skyon gyis ma gos phyir bsnams //
T02D1689:36a-18: g-yon gyi thams bum pa legs thogs //
T02D1689:36a-19: 'gro ba kun la dbang mchog ster ma //
T02D1689:36a-20: phyag 'tshal seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma //
T02D1689:36a-21: yi ge t'am las 'khrungs pa'i lha mo //
T02D1689:36a-22: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes mtshon pa'i //
T02D1689:36a-23: skra 'khyil me tog gis brgyan mdzes ma //
T02D1689:36a-24: phyag 'tshal g-yas brkyang zhabs la g-yon pas //
T02D1689:36a-25: thabs dang shes rab mi 'bral 'khril bas //
T02D1689:36a-26: padma zla ba'i steng na bzhugs ma //
T02D1689:36a-27: zhal gcig phyag gnyis zhi ba'i gzugs can //
T02D1689:36a-28: phyag 'tshal g-yas pas 'gro la mchog stsol //
T02D1689:36a-29: g-yon na autpala rgyan rnams yongs rdzogs //
T02D1689:36a-30: sngo ljang 'gying bag ras ma'i mdog can //
T02D1689:36a-31: gzhon nu spyan yangs nu ma rgyas ma //
T02D1689:36a-32: phyag 'tshal mya ngan sel ba'i sgrol ma //
T02D1689:36a-33: ma chags padma dmar po'i steng du //
T02D1689:36a-34: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zhabs kyis mnan te //
T02D1689:36a-35: rol pa'i 'dug stangs 'gying bag mdzes ma //
T02D1689:36a-36: phyag 'tshal 'jig rten dbang du mdzad ma //
T02D1689:36a-37: sku mdog padma r'a ga ltar dmar //
T02D1689:36a-38: bzhad pa'i gad rgyangs tutt'a ra yis //
T02D1689:36a-39: 'gro ba'i nyon mongs ma lus sel ma //
T02D1689:36a-40: phyag 'tshal zhal gcig phyag bzhis bdud 'dul //
T02D1689:36a-41: dang po gnyis ni spyi bor thal sbyar //
T02D1689:36a-42: g-yas 'og ral gri phyag rgya dang ldan//
T02D1689:36b-0: @36b g-yon na mya ngan med pa'i yal ga / phyag 'tshal 'gro ba 'gugs pa'i sgrol ma //
T02D1689:36b-1: gzi brjid phung po nyi ma'i steng na //
T02D1689:36b-2: padma'i gdan la rol bas g-yas brkyang //
T02D1689:36b-3: 'gying bag nag mo dbang gi las mdzad //
T02D1689:36b-4: phyag 'tshal dpa' mo g-yad kyi cha byad //
T02D1689:36b-5: mtshan mo sprin rum mun pa'i mdog can //
T02D1689:36b-6: shin tu 'jigs rung bdud dpung zil gnon //
T02D1689:36b-7: nor gyi char 'bebs phongs pa sel ma //
T02D1689:36b-8: phyag 'tshal yi ge h'um gi sbyor bas //
T02D1689:36b-9: phyogs mtshams rnams nas gza' chen brgyad 'gugs //
T02D1689:36b-10: zhal gcig phyag gnyis g-yas pa lcags kyu //
T02D1689:36b-11: g-yon pas rol pa'i zhags pa bsnams ma //
T02D1689:36b-12: phyag 'tshal bkra shis ster ba'i sgrol ma //
T02D1689:36b-13: sna tshogs padma zla ba'i gdan la //
T02D1689:36b-14: rdo rje skyil krung gser gyi mdangs ldan //
T02D1689:36b-15: zhal gcig phyag brgyad zla tshes brgyan ma //
T02D1689:36b-16: phyag 'chal g-yas kyi dang po rtse gsum //
T02D1689:36b-17: gnyis pa na ni thugs rje'i lcags kyu //
T02D1689:36b-18: gsum pa rdo rjes bdud kyi dpung 'joms //
T02D1689:36b-19: bzhi pa shes rab ral gri bsnams ma //
T02D1689:36b-20: phyag 'tshal g-yon gyi dang po nor bu //

T02D1689:36b-22: 'gro ba kun la bkra shis ster ma //
T02D1689:36b-23: gnyis pa lcags kyu gsum pa dbyu gu //
T02D1689:36b-24: bzhi pa nor gyi bum pa bsnams ma //
T02D1689:36b-25: phyag 'tshal smin par byed pa'i sgrol ma //
T02D1689:36b-26: bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i dbus su //
T02D1689:36b-27: nyi ma padma dmar po'i gdan la //
T02D1689:36b-28: bzhengs pa'i 'dor stabs g-yas brkyang g-yon bskum //
T02D1689:36b-29: phyag 'tshal sku mchog shin tu mi bzad ;
T02D1689:36b-30: / padma r'a ga lta bur dmar zhing //
T02D1689:36b-31: dpa' ba'i cha byad zhal gcig phyag bzhi //
T02D1689:36b-32: drag mo chen mo dgra dpung 'joms ma //
T02D1689:36b-33: phyag 'tshal g-yas kyi dang po ral gri //
T02D1689:36b-34: gnyis pa mda' yis nyon mongs 'bigs ma //
T02D1689:36b-35: g-yon pa 'khor lo gnyis pa gzhu thogs //
T02D1689:36b-36: mchu dang smin ma khro gnyer gyen zlog / phyag 'tshal khro gnyer g-yo ba'i sgrol ma //
T02D1689:36b-37: nyi ma padma dmar po'i gdan la //
T02D1689:36b-38: g-yas brkyang gar gyis mi ro mnan nas //
T02D1689:36b-39: sku mdog nag mo 'jigs gzugs ldan ma //
T02D1689:36b-40: phyag 'tshal zhal dang smin ma rab bsdus //
T02D1689:37a-0: @37a * // g-yas dkar g-yon dmar khro gnyer dang ldan //
T02D1689:37a-1: dmar ba'i spyan gsum sdang mig rab bgrad //

T02D1689:37a-3: phyag 'tshal sbrul dang stag gi gos gsol //
T02D1689:37a-4: thod pa'i cod pa na mgo bo'i do shal //
T02D1689:37a-5: ral gri dbyu gu lcags kyu bsnams nas //

T02D1689:37a-13: gnyis pa na ni legs pa'i phyag rgya //

T02D1689:37a-22: zhal gcig spyan gsum byi ru'i mdog can //

T02D1689:37a-24: thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa'i phyag gnyis //

T02D1689:37a-28: snying po 'bras bur bcas pa'i shing 'dzin //
T02D1689:37a-29: thugs kyi snying po yi ge bcu pas //
T02D1689:37a-30: dgos pa'i dngos grub ma lus 'byung ma //
T02D1689:37a-31: phyag 'tshal bde ba sgrub pa'i sgrol ma //
T02D1689:37a-32: padma dkar po 'bar ba'i steng du //
T02D1689:37a-33: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyi ma'i gdan la //
T02D1689:37a-34: sems dpa'i skyil krung dpa' bar bzhugs ma //
T02D1689:37a-35: phyag 'tshal bde ba'i sku mdog dmar ser //
T02D1689:37a-36: zhal gcig phyag gnyis h'um gi phrin las ;
T02D1689:37a-37: /'jig rten gsum po dbang du bsdus nas //
T02D1689:37a-38: bde ba thams cad grub par mdzad ma //
T02D1689:37a-39: phyag 'tshal thogs med nam mkha'i lus can //
T02D1689:37a-40: phyag gnyis thugs kar 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya //
T02D1689:37a-41: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu bsnams nas //

T02D1689:37b-1: / phyag 'tshal rnam par rgyal ba'i sgrol ma //
T02D1689:37b-2: padma dkar po'i steng gi zla ba'i //

T02D1689:37b-4: steng du sems dpa'i skyil krung bzhugs ma //
T02D1689:37b-5: phyag 'tshal zag med bde chen rab rgyas //
T02D1689:37b-6: sku mdog dkar mo dung gi mdangs ldan //
T02D1689:37b-7: zhal gcig phyag bzhi t'a ra gnyis brjod //
T02D1689:37b-8: yi ge phat kyis dug rnams sel ma //
T02D1689:37b-9: phyag 'tshal dga' ba'i phyag rgya dang ldan //
T02D1689:37b-10: phyag gnyis spyi bor lcags kyu rab 'dzin //
T02D1689:37b-11: g-yas 'og mchog sbyin g-yon gyi gnyis pa //
T02D1689:37b-12: autpala steng du po ti bsnams ma //

T02D1689:37b-14: pad dkar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus na //

T02D1689:37b-16: cung zad g-yas brkyang bar ni bzhugs ma //
T02D1689:37b-17: phyag 'tshal dkar mo dung gi mdangs ldan //

T02D1689:37b-20: 'gro ba'i nyon mongs ma lus sel ma //

T02D1689:37b-23: sdug bsngal ma lus bsreg par mdzad cing //
T02D1689:37b-24: 'gro rnams thar pa'i lam la 'god ma //
T02D1689:37b-25: phyag 'tshal dngos grub 'byung ba'i sgrol ma //
T02D1689:37b-26: sku mdog dmar ser las kyi rigs mtshon //
T02D1689:37b-27: padma dkar po steng gi zla ba'i //

T02D1689:37b-29: phyag 'tshal dpal mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis //

T02D1689:37b-31: thugs kar gser gyi bum pa bsnams ma //

T02D1689:37b-33: phyag 'tshal bum pa bzang dang nor bu //
T02D1689:37b-34: 'dod 'jo'i ba dang dpag bsam shing chen //

T02D1689:37b-37: phyag 'tshal yongs su rdzogs byed sgrol ma //

T02D1689:37b-41: phyag 'tshal dkar mo zhal gcig spyan gsum //
T02D1689:37b-42: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gzigs ma //
T02D1689:38a-0: zhe sdang ma spangs gnas su @38a * //
T02D1689:38a-2: dur khrod stag gi sham thabs bcings ma //
T02D1689:38a-3: phyag 'tshal g-yas pas mu tig phreng 'dzin //
T02D1689:38a-4: thugs rje mi bzad rab tu khros pas //
T02D1689:38a-5: g-yon pa'i phyag na rtse gsum mdung thogs //
T02D1689:38a-6: dug gsum 'khor ba'i rgyu la bsnun ma //
T02D1689:38a-7: zla ba yar ngo'i tshes brgyad dag la //
T02D1689:38a-8: gang gis rnam dag gtsug gi nor bu //
T02D1689:38a-9: bstod ba'i rgyal po blo yis //
T02D1689:38a-10: slan grangs nyi shug rtsa gcig brjod na //
T02D1689:38a-11: rgyal po sbrul dang srin po mi rgod //
T02D1689:38a-12: me dang chu dang stag dang seng ge /'jigs pa chen po brgyad las grol 'gyur //
T02D1689:38a-13: mu ge nad dang 'byung pos 'tshe ba //
T02D1689:38a-14: sdug bsngal yid mi bde las grol 'gyur //
T02D1689:38a-15: sdig pa chen po rnams dang skal ngan //
T02D1689:38a-17: nyon mongs mya ngan gdung ba rnams sel //
T02D1689:38a-18: sa 'og gter dang mig sman ri lu //
T02D1689:38a-19: rkang mgyogs la sogs dngos grub brgyad thob //
T02D1689:38a-20: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dbang phyug / rdzu 'phrul kun 'gro gnas la sogs pa'i //
T02D1689:38a-21: dbang phyug las la dka' ba ma yin //
T02D1689:38a-22: bdag por byed dang dga' mgur bsgrub pa'i //
T02D1689:38a-24: de bzhin yon tan brgyad kyang thob 'gyur //
T02D1689:38a-25: yid bzhin nor bu dpag bsam shing dang //
T02D1689:38a-26: dpal ldan 'dod 'jo'i ba dang bum mchog / bde ba dang bcas nor rnams 'grub 'gyur //
T02D1689:38a-27: mtshan mo rgyu dang lto 'phye 'byung po //
T02D1689:38a-28: sha za'i tshogs kyis glags rnyed mi 'gyur //
T02D1689:38a-29: tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug chen po ;
T02D1689:38a-30: /'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po rnams kyis //
T02D1689:38a-31: dgos pa'i don rnams 'grub par mdzad cing //
T02D1689:38a-32: bar du gcod pa rnams ni sel 'gyur //
T02D1689:38a-33: gang du tshe yi 'du byed btang dus //
T02D1689:38a-34: bde ba can gyi zhing du skye 'gyur //
T02D1689:38a-35: dngos grub 'byung gnas rje btsun sgrol ma'i //
T02D1689:38a-36: lha mchog rnams la bdag gis bstod pas //
T02D1689:38a-37: dge ba dri med zla ba rgyas 'dra'i //
T02D1689:38a-38: 'od ltar dkar ba thob pa des ni //
T02D1689:38a-39: 'jig rten rtsod pa'i skyon bral rdzogs pa'i //
T02D1689:38a-40: sangs rgyas thob nas sems can rnams la //
T02D1689:38a-41: bde chen char pa 'bebs par shog cig / sgrol
T02D1689:38b-0: ma mngon par 'byung @38b ba'i le'u bdun cu rtsa
T02D1689:38b-1: gnyis pa / rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud kyi nang nas /
T02D1689:38b-2: lha'i rnam grangs bstan pa'i le'u bcu gsum pa /
T02D1689:38b-3: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas gsungs pa dang mthun par /
T02D1689:38b-4: lha mo sgrol ma nyi shu rtsa gcig la bstod
T02D1689:38b-5: pa rnam dag gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba
T02D1689:38b-6: / slob dpon chen po s'urya gupta'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1689:38b-8: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po d'i pam ka ra shr'i dzny'a na dang /
T02D1689:38b-9: bod kyi lo ts'a ba rgya brtson 'grus seng ges
